appetizers.name: Bhel Poori
appetizers.description: Rice puffs, tomatoes, onions, tamarind and mint chutneys mixed together with light spices. A perfect appetizer for summer

appetizers.name: Spinach Chaat
appetizers.description: Fresh Spinach leaves dipped in chic-pea batter golden fried topped with potatoes, chic-peas, yogurt, mint, and tamarind chutney.

entrees.name: Tandoori  Vegetables
entrees.description: Lightly spiced grilled  vegetables and cubes of paneer, served with veg pulao rice,  raita and tikka masala sauce.

entrees.name: Chicken Chapli Kabob
entrees.description: Grilled minced chicken patties, marinated with ginger, garlic and spices, served with veg pulao rice,  raita and tikka masala sauce.

entrees.name: Lamb Bihari Kabob
entrees.description: Tender lamb cubes, lightly marinated grilled in the tandoor, served with veg pulao rice,  raita and tikka masala sauce.

entrees.name: Tandoori Salmon Tikka
entrees.description: Fresh Salmon fillets marinated with a touch of yogurt and light spices, cooked in the tandoor to perfection, served with veg pulao rice,  raita and tikka masala sauce.
